name: Voxella (itch)
description:
Available in English and toki pona!

Welcome to the world of Voxella! Here we see a young Muigi plopped into the world, with nothing to do but discover. Complete quests for other people, find treasures, explore dark caves and mysterious factories, unlock the secrets of the world and have a friendly conversation with a giant spider! Because, in the world of Voxella, everything is a conversation topic if you try hard enough.

kama pona tawa ma Voxella! ma ni la, mi lukin e jan Mipi lon ma ni. ona li ken alasa e ale. o pini e pali tawa jan, o lukin e mani mute, o lukin e ma anpa pimeja e tomo pali monsuta, o open e kon pi ma ale, o toki tawa pipi ike suli! tan ni: ma Voxella la, sina alasa mute la, ale li ken toki.

CONTROLS:

WASD to move
E to open your inventory
Shift to run
Left click to use items
Right click to interact
Scroll wheel to switch between items
P to use commands

nasin lawa:

WASD li tawa
E li kepeken e poki jo
Shift li wawa e tawa
P li kepeken lawa wawa
ilo luka la:
nena nanpa wan li kepeken
nena nanpa tu li toki
nena sike li ante e jo

NOTE: Yes, this is another early access beta game. If you would like to report a bug, or you would like to suggest something, you can use the itch.io community page or the Voxella channel in the Okey Collective Discord. (https://discord.gg/A7RjWgy)

IJO: musi ni li pini ala. mi awen pali e musi ni.  sina wile toki e ike pi musi ni la sina ken kepeken lipu itch.io lon anpa, anu tomo Voxella lon kulupu Okey pi ilo Siko. (https://discord.gg/A7RjWgy)
